segments.text: Yes , I'd like to know how to use the library . You know , I'm a new student here .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All you need is your student identification card to check out books .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you very much . By the way , how many books am I allowed to check out ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You can check out two books at a time . But you can't check out newspapers , magazines and periodicals , they have to be read within library .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How long can I keep the books ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: For two weeks . After that you must renew the book if you wish to keep them longer .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I want a book on physics . Could you show me where I can find it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , over there to your left .
segments.speaker: S2
